mapper.insert: insert into leave_tb values(default, #{userId}, default, #{reason}, #{leaveDate}, #{endDate}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update leave_tb set leave_date = #{leaveDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, update_date = now() where id = #{id}
update leave_tb set status = 2 where id = #{id}
update leave_tb set status = 3 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, user_id as userId, reason, status, leave_date as leaveDate, end_date as endDate, register_date as registerDate, update_date as updateDate from leave_tb where user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) from leave_tb where user_id = #{userId}

select lt.id, lt.user_id as userId, lt.status, lt.reason, lt.leave_date as leaveDate, lt.end_date as endDate, lt.register_date as registerDate, lt.update_date as updateDate, ut.name as userName, ut.img as userImg, from leave_tb lt left outer join user_tb ut on(lt.user_id = ut.id)

select lt.id, lt.user_id as userId, lt.status, lt.leave_date as leaveDate, lt.end_date as endDate, lt.register_date as registerDate, lt.update_date as updateDate, ut.name as userName, ut.img as userImg, dpt.name as departName from leave_tb lt left outer join doctor_tb dt on(lt.doctor_id = dt.id) left outer join user_tb ut on(dt.user_id = ut.id) left outer join depart_tb dpt on(dt.depart_id = dpt.id) where lt.id = #{id}
